attributes.action: Legislate for school escorts on transport from home to Specialist Support schools to receive mandatory disability awareness training.
attributes.additional_details:
Legislate for school escorts on school transport (from home to Specialist Support schools and return) to receive the required disability awareness training. If they don't have the required training, they should not escort our children.

Often, as parents of children with additional or special needs, we find the transport to school and home are staffed by escorts who have no idea how to relate to our children, either when they are distressed or just in interacting with them.

Escorts have a duty to of care whilst the children are under their supervision. How can they assist the children's needs if a) they don't understand them and b) see them as just a necessary burden for their job.

Please UK Government, make this disability awareness training mandatory for school escorts on Specialist Support school transport from home to school and home again.

Thank you.
